metadata.name: Synthflower #1/4
metadata.description:
This stunning NFT artwork depicts a beautiful anime-inspired girl surrounded by a vibrant neon garden. This one-of-a-kind piece captures the fusion of anime and cyberpunk aesthetics. 

The title, "Synthflower," captures the essence of this artwork, highlighting the fusion of the natural and the synthetic. The vivid colors and intricate details of the artwork make it a truly immersive experience that is sure to captivate any anime or cyberpunk enthusiast.
